name: Moment of Clarity
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You peek into the future and see exactly how to achieve the outcome you want. For the rest of your turn, when you would roll, treat the result as if you had rolled a 20.

Casting this spell causes your eyes to visibly glow, making it obvious you used magic to influence your actions.

Trying to cast this spell again before finishing a break causes you to have a sharp headache, dealing 6d12 psychic damage to you which cannot be reduced or prevented.
